html:
8.7.17  3:07 pm   How to be a crab?

     check to see if you already are

8.7.17  2:57 pm   Y'know that 5-10 minute period just before going to sleep, and just after waking up from sleep? I find that my most adventurous ideas occur during that time period, probably something to do with the brain still being in "dream mode" despite being awake. You ever have occurrences like this?

     oh hell yeah

8.7.17  2:23 pm   Did you know that the chorus of Til The World Ends by Britney Spears is a 4:3 polyrhythm???

     yes, but it re-aligns itself every 2 bars, which is normal when doing this polyrhythm in 4/4 and music in 4 and 8 bar phrases

      Actually, it's one of the best uses of this polyrhythm I've heard in the sense that it seems so easy and natural (unforced), so much so that it fits in smoothly to a bubblegum-y dance pop song. 

     i think you may also enjoy 'beautiful people' by benny benassi / chris brown, released in the same year. tumbling dotted 8ths were quite the rage around that time. you also might enjoy the main riff from 'let me love you' by neyo. this one has an interestingly timed way of correcting itself

8.7.17  1:58 pm   If you call here a question a "ueqstion",

     which i do not

      how come you don't call an answer a "nsawer"?

8.7.17  11:52 am   when you won your shorty award why did you just say "thank you" and walk off stage? 

     that was my way of thanking them for giving me the award. in my country, "thank you" is customary for the purpose of expressing thanks. the reason i walked off stage was to give them an opportunity to announce the winner of the next award, and continue the show from there

8.7.17  11:41 am   Is it better to think outside the box, or is it better to make your own box and think inside of there?

     you can think in any box you want, but it is important to remember not to stay in 1 box forever

8.7.17  11:34 am   Is the opposite of a ♭ a ♯ or a ♮?

     i think the opposite of Ab is D

8.7.17  10:05 am   what is the true meaning of the "hi, I'm steve" song? (THE 2 SONGS)

     the meaning of both songs is that putting music in a video can be nice. a hidden meaning is that music in videos is actually SO powerful that it makes the audience become attached to whatever music in the video, and demand a 'full verion' of it, regardless of how much better (and/or 'full') music i have already done without videos

8.7.17  9:54 am   describe yourself in one word

     ok

8.7.17  9:24 am   do you see patterns everywhere in your real life?

     sure

     yes did you ever feel like events are repeating itself in exactly the same manner every day?

     not exactly, but similar

     do you realize it's not just our days but whole world's and history always recurs in different ways?

     yes

8.7.17  9:14 am   did you ever satisfy yourself with pain and feel gratified when your mind tortured you? 

     no

8.7.17  4:46 am   Do I owe you for inspiring me?

     not necessarily

      Is there any way I can pay you back?

     you could use money or just continue to be inspired

8.7.17  4:21 am   I want to get better at the flute, its been my instrument of choice for years and though i have been improving, it never shows when i try and play at concerts or in tests, i just end up breathing so speraticaly beacuse of the stress and mess up, even though when i practice, i do really well! Any tips on how to avoid/fix my problem? 

     the only way to reduce nervousness in front of audiences is to spend more time in front of audiences

8.7.17  4:03 am   Do normies deserve to be crushed like scum?

     no

8.7.17  3:19 am   Is the "movie star" song in 9/8?

     you could think of it various ways. i think 9/4 would be a reasonable way to think of the chorus. the verse is loosely based on that pattern as well, but also breaks it at the end of each half

8.7.17  2:49 am   any cool examples of delayed resolution in pop song that's not the IIb7M then I ?

     i don't know what IIb7M means, perhaps you are using different notation than i'm used to

8.7.17  1:22 am   Do you think when you're doing a video/music?

     yes

     I've quite impressed of how randome they can be.

     i would like to point out that the visual motions are exactly synchronized with the audio, and they frequently have words on screen that exactly matches the words spoken in the audio. this is not random, and requires work, focus, and thinking. if the audio and video were done randomly and did not match, you would be questioning whether or not something was wrong with the video

8.7.17  12:54 am   do you want to take a break from answering questions and walk through several zip codes together? 

     sure

8.7.17  12:48 am   8.6.17  3:59 pm  8.5.17  3:21 pm RE: RE: bilabial trill and oven display: I've never met anyone else who can do this! I try to explain it to people but they can't seem to do it. They probably don't believe me that it's real.

This happens because some lights flicker with the AC power at 50 or 60 Hz, and some of the segments are out of phase with the others. So if you vibrate your head up and down at about the same frequency, you see some lights appear to be higher or lower than others, depending whether your head is at the top or bottom of its vibration when that light flickers.

I find it works best with LED Christmas lights, but oven displays are pretty good too.

8.7.17  12:46 am   How does one make good content with out it being garbage ????

     you will have to just experiment until you find what works

8.7.17  12:37 am   Do you think it's important to make a difference in the world around you?

     yes

      Is it a central goal in your life to help as many people as possible (including yourself) live the best lives they can?

     it is nice to factor that into the agenda

      Just wondering because I've thought about it and it seems like that's part of what I want to do but I'm not sure how reasonable it is.

     ah, yes, that works too

8.6.17  10:18 pm   I just noticed you use several different fonts in your movie star vid. what made you change your mind from your "don't worry about fonts" stance?

8.6.17  10:15 pm   How do I learn to play piano??

     step 1, spend some time at the piano. try the notes, start getting an idea of what happens when you press them. let me know what you have discovered, and if you think are ready for the next step

8.6.17  9:21 pm   do you enjoy listening to music that you don't like so that you can learn how to not do the things that kind of music does? Or would you rather be listening to music that you like so that you can learn how to use elements of that music in your music? or both? or neither, maybe?

     it is nice to listen to music i 'don't like', but not to learn to avoid it. to learn to like it. it is always good to find an understanding of everything that happens in your world

8.7.17  3:03 am   will there ever be anything added to reality again? asking for a friend

     yes

8.6.17  8:32 pm   i just. i love it when picked or plucked strings sound SOAPY. you can hear it on a bright acoustic guitar but... even more on a banjo or mandolin. there's something about the satisfying, slippery but solid texture of that sound that makes me think of soap. even dragging a pick across a string sounds like what it feels like to run your fingernail over a bar of soap. all the little stops and starts. mmmm. yummy right

     oh damn, you are special

8.6.17  8:10 pm   Why don't you use capital letters? Is it a stylistic choice?

     why don't you ever notice when i do

8.6.17  7:51 pm   In your movie star video at about 2:20 the horns have something interesting going on with their attack and decay. What did you do to make that sound?

     if i recall correctly i assigned not only the volume to the modwheel, but also a little bit of filter cutoff to modwheel as well. that way you can manually immitate a (i think almost) real sounding sfz trumpet articulation

8.6.17  6:56 pm   What the hell i'm supposed to do here ? I'm confused and that make me sad

      read questions, ask a question, etc. that sort of thing

     we can talk about it in court

     i think i've already done that

8.6.17  6:10 pm   what are some nouns that you like to verb?

     surprise me

8.6.17  5:54 pm   do you like to surf? by surfing i mean like riding the waves of thoughts and emotions

     oh hell yeah

8.6.17  5:50 pm   When you are making content, and you think of something really funny to put in... Do you ever laugh out loud? 

     oh hell yeah

8.6.17  5:49 pm   is anything possible?

     i think so

8.6.17  5:21 pm   you seem to feel pressure from your fans in a lot of different ways but then you also say that you try to tune out your fans when it comes to your creative process and only focus on the videos you want to make. but if the pressure from your fans has an effect on you personally, how could that not influence your process, even if it's only on a subconscious level?

     it's kind of like carrying an object. the weight of the object makes you heavier, but you are still able to carry the object wherever you choose. and you become stronger. and object gets to travel to new places

8.6.17  5:07 pm   what is the meaning of the universe if there is no intelligent beings that will give it a meaning?

     to try to see if it's possible to make intelligent beings. or perhaps something even more intelligent than beings

8.6.17  5:05 pm   do you think music and poetry are relevant?

     to what

8.6.17  4:55 pm   hey bill. i always feel guilty when i feel bad because i feel like it it super annoying for others when i feel bad. what can i do about this? 

     become a professional stuntperson

8.6.17  4:41 pm   let me amend what i was worried about with the whole individuals thing. to be an individual i think is SUPER IMPORTANT AND MEANINGFUL!!!! but most of life's positions and jobs and stations are devoid of any respect for individuality. people are treated as assets, machines. i think most people just loan out their time in life as Unique people in order to have money, for living. that's AWFUL. i want to do so much, i dont want to be a machine. but am i really so different from most people? why do i deserve to escape the fate most are consigned to

     this particular world has a competitive nature to it. i don't really know why it is that way, but it is. everyone is unique. but you need to fight for your uniqueness. and also try being even more unique, and fighting even harder

8.6.17  4:15 pm   is cheating cheating?

     i think so
